alert.note: Alert for Bay; Huron; Saginaw; Tuscola (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 3:40PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A cluster of thunderstorms will impact portions of Tuscola, Bay, Saginaw and Huron Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 337 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of thunderstorms from Bentley to Merrill to Caro, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Heavy rainfall and cloud to ground lightning. Winds have remained below 30mph with these storms. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Rapid rises in local creeks and ponding of water in low- lying areas. Locations impacted by this storm include Saginaw, Carrollton, Garfield, Arthur, Colling, Huron City, Wisner, Ivanhoe, Grindstone City, Ellington and Crump. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EDT for southeastern Michigan.
